content: menelaos mitts by teleri from http //with2hands blogspot com ravelry username teli materials 50g malabrigo yarn sock 402m/100g in „boticelli red a set of dpns in 2 5mm a tapestry needle for weaving in ends stitch holder or some waste yarn finished measurements height 20 5cm circumference 16cm after blocking unstretched gauge 38sts x 58 row = 10cm x 10cm in pattern gauge is not crucial for this project since the pattern is very elastic pattern notes i m using some abbreviations in this pattern most of them are explained for example here http //www knitty com/issuew11/patterns php#ksbbb for the m1r m1l and m1p increases tutorials can be found for example on this page http //www leethalknits com/tutorials/m1 html or use your favorite method instead directions right mitten cuff co 64sts i prefer a doubled long-tail cast on but use whatever technique you like divide sts evenly onto dpns and start working in the round being careful not to twist round 1 p1 k2 p3 k2 to end rounds 2-12 repeat round 1 round 13 start working in pattern for right mitten work 4 full repeats of the pattern then work row 1 once thumb gusset round 54 work in pattern for 32sts m1p p1 m1p k7 p1 k7 to end round 55 work in pattern for 33sts place first marker k1 place second marker p1 k7 to end round 56 work in pattern to marker slm k1 slm p1 k7 to end round 57 work in pattern to marker slm m1l k1 m1r slm p1 k7 to end round 58 work in pattern to marker slm k3 slm p1 k7 to end round 59 repeat round 58 round 60 work in pattern to marker slm k1 m1l k to one st before second marker m1r k1 slm p1 k7 to end round 61 work in pattern to marker slm k to second marker slm p1 k7 to end round 62 repeat round 61 repeat rounds 60-62 until there are 17sts between markers palm round 81 work in pattern for 32sts slip the next 19sts on a stitch holder or piece of waste yarn pulling out markers on the way co 1st using the backwards loop method k7 p1 k7 to end round 82 work in pattern for 32sts p1 k7 to end repeat round 82 until your have completed 8 full repeats of right mitten pattern on the back of the hand in total just count the repeats from ribbing to where your needles are repeat round 82 once more working row 1 of right mitten pattern repeat round 1 for 11 round bind off all sts thumb round1 place the 19 thumb sts you put on hold back on the needles and knit them pick up and
